MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers calling from the DG11 Postcode area of Lockerbie, affecting properties in Peacock Place and surrounding areas. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30pm to safely complete repairs on our underground cable network on Castle Break and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3:30pm. We will make every effort to contact you if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:10pm on Wednesday, 28 October 2020
